[
    Expression {
        expr: StaticMethodCall {
            target: Identifier(
                SimpleIdentifier(
                    SimpleIdentifier {
                        span: (
                            1,
                            7,
                        ),
                        name: "Foo",
                    },
                ),
            ),
            method: Variable(
                VariableVariable(
                    VariableVariable {
                        span: (
                            1,
                            12,
                        ),
                        variable: SimpleVariable(
                            SimpleVariable {
                                span: (
                                    1,
                                    13,
                                ),
                                name: "a",
                            },
                        ),
                    },
                ),
            ),
            args: [],
        },
    },
]
